link.title: St. Cloud Math and Science Academy, St. Cloud MN

meta.name: description
meta.content: St. Cloud Math and Science Academy provides a challenging science, technology, engineering & math based learning environment for elementary students.
St. Cloud Math and Science Academy, St. Cloud MN
St. Cloud Math and Science Academy provides a challenging science, technology, engineering & math based learning environment for elementary students.

span.span: Great teaching in a kind place!
St. Cloud Math and Science Academy

We are a tuition free public charter school for students in grades K-5 delivering science, technology, engineering, and mathematics-focused standards- aligned education to students in the St. Cloud Area.
